channel.title: [VB6.0] Playersnumber
channel.description:
This piece of delicious code i wrote gets the number of players from the runescape website.
[code]Function Players() As String Dim tmpLong(1) As Long, tmpInet As Object, HTML As String Set tmpInet = CreateObject("InetCtls.Inet") HTML = tmpInet.OpenURL("http://www.runescape.com/title.ws") tmpLong(0) = InStr(1, HTML, "There are currently ") + 20 tmpLong(1) = InStr(1, HTML, " people playing!") Players = Mid(HTML, tmpLong(0), tmpLong(1) - tmpLong(0)) End Function[/code]
Normally you don't even need the msinet ocx file :D

item.title: [VB6.0] Playersnumber
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote="Martin, post:3, topic:451"]what bout this LOL

Function Players() As String
Dim tmpLong(1) As Long, tmpInet As Object, HTML As String
    Set tmpInet = CreateObject("InetCtls.Inet")
    HTML = tmpInet.OpenURL("http://www.runescape.com/title.ws")
    tmpLong(0) = InStr(1, HTML, "There are currently ") + 20
    tmpLong(1) = InStr(1, HTML, " autoers mining ess!")
    Players = Mid(HTML, tmpLong(0), tmpLong(1) - tmpLong(0))
End Function

[/quote]

item.title: [VB6.0] Playersnumber
item.dc:creator: @Martin Martin
item.description:
@Martin wrote:

what bout this LOL

Function Players() As String
Dim tmpLong(1) As Long, tmpInet As Object, HTML As String
    Set tmpInet = CreateObject("InetCtls.Inet")
    HTML = tmpInet.OpenURL("http://www.runescape.com/title.ws")
    tmpLong(0) = InStr(1, HTML, "There are currently ") + 20
    tmpLong(1) = InStr(1, HTML, " n00b5 w4st1ng th31r l1v35!!=D!!")
    Players = Mid(HTML, tmpLong(0), tmpLong(1) - tmpLong(0))
End Function

item.title: [VB6.0] Playersnumber
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

This piece of delicious code i wrote gets the number of players from the runescape website.

Function Players() As String
Dim tmpLong(1) As Long, tmpInet As Object, HTML As String
    Set tmpInet = CreateObject("InetCtls.Inet")
    HTML = tmpInet.OpenURL("http://www.runescape.com/title.ws")
    tmpLong(0) = InStr(1, HTML, "There are currently ") + 20
    tmpLong(1) = InStr(1, HTML, " people playing!")
    Players = Mid(HTML, tmpLong(0), tmpLong(1) - tmpLong(0))
End Function

Normally you don't even need the msinet ocx file
